meanings.definition: Not studied or prepared in advance.
meanings.sent1: The unstudied test caught me off guard.
meanings.sent2: She gave an unstudied speech at the last minute.
meanings.sent3: His unstudied answers made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her unstudied approach to the project was refreshing.
meanings.sent5: The unstudied forest was full of surprises.

meanings.sent1: Her unstudied smile brightened the room.
meanings.sent2: He had an unstudied charm that drew people in.
meanings.sent3: The unstudied way she danced was captivating.
meanings.sent4: His unstudied kindness touched everyone's hearts.
meanings.sent5: The unstudied laughter of children is contagious.

meanings.sent1: The unstudied play had a raw authenticity.
meanings.sent2: Their unstudied performance was full of energy.
meanings.sent3: The unstudied party turned into a fun chaos.
meanings.sent5: The unstudied painting captured the moment perfectly.
